thinkpol.saver.saver module¶

class thinkpol.saver.saver.Saver(url)¶

Bases: object

save(field, data)¶
thinkpol.saver.saver.parse_url(url)¶

Receives a url that specifies which database we should connect to, connects to it and returns a database object that the server can use.

Parameters

url (str) – the url we connect to, formatted data_base_type://host:port

Returns

the database object

Return type

DataBase

Raises

ValueError

Module contents¶

A framework that uses various database drivers to save information it gets about snapshots to a database.

Thinkpol
